events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on the highway causing significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as the damages are related to a car collision.
An agent was assigned to the case to manage all follow-ups and communications with the customer.
The claim acknowledgment was sent promptly to inform the customer that the case is now active.
Request sent to customer for police report, photos of the accident, and repair estimates for the vehicle.
Customer submitted all required documents including official police report and detailed repair estimates.
Investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and contacted repair shops for verification.
Investigation concluded that the claim is valid and damages align with the reported collision details.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering all repair costs and rental reimbursement.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely handling of the claim.
Final approval was given for the settlement amount following customer's acceptance of the terms.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customer's bank account successfully.
The claim was officially closed after confirming all payments were received and repairs completed.
The case file has been archived for future reference and compliance with insurance records policies.
